title: Knife, ca. 1700
medium: shark skin, silver, brass, steel, amber
markings: On blade: crossed swords (partly illegible) hammer
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade sabre-shaped, rounded bolster, plain ferrule with jagged edge. Pistol-shaped handle of clear amber. A silver lion on top of handle sitting straight up, looking backwards, his forelegs resting on a ball (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. shark skin, silver, brass, steel, amber. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-136-b.
